name: Convict Tales
description:
Convict Tales allows students to follow the path of early European Settlement of Australia. Designed to align with years 4 and 5 HASS in the Australian National Curriculum, Convict Tales engages students with two different story modes to enable them to learn more about Australia's convict past. 

In "My Journey Home", players play as a customisable character that commences their journey in the United Kingdom, through a series of choices they make their way to Australia. 

In "Stories of our Past", players have the opportunity to play the stories of prominent Australian convicts whose stories have significantly shaped Australia's history. 

____________

Convict tales is still in early development. This version of the game currently includes the "My Journey Home" component of the game and allows players to play the story from start to transport.
